sentences.sContent: He is an engrossing subject for a book.
sentences.sCn: 他是非常有趣的写书题材。

remMethod.val: en(进入) + gross(总的) → 全部进入状态 → 全神贯注于

words.tran: 全神贯注的；专心致志的
使全神贯注；用大字体书写；正式写成（决议等）；独占；吸引

trans.tranCn: 引人入胜的, 极有趣的
trans.tranOther: Something that is engrossing is very interesting and holds your attention completely
